snippet: The failure was not due to the methods — two different pills and a vaginal gel — but to the fact that the women did not use them consistently.
abstract: Scientists report failure in large African trial of three different ways to protect women against HIV, citing women's failure to use methods consistently.
lead_paragraph: The failure was not due to the methods — two different pills and a vaginal gel — but to the fact that the women did not use them consistently.

headline.main: African Trial of H.I.V. Drugs Fails
headline.print_headline: African Trial of H.I.V. Drugs Fails
